#labels Phase-Implementation,SQL,wikt_parsed
How to extract some information from the database *wikt_parsed* of the parsed Wiktionary.

= wikt_parsed =

The number of entries and selected types of lexical semantic information available from the Russian edition of Wiktionary as of January 2009 (see ruwikt20090122_parsed_with_translation).

|| *Question* || *SQL* || *Result* || *Comment* || en || de || ru || uk ||
|| Enlglish language code || SELECT `*` FROM lang WHERE code="en"; || id = 85 || || 85 || 74 || 276 || 352 ||
|| Entries || SELECT COUNT(`*`) FROM lang_pos WHERE lang_id=85; || 2'813 || || 2813 || 13'072 || 124'301 || 88'575 ||
||  || SQL ||  || || en || de || ru || uk ||
